description:
Kogoro picks up a dark horse betting ticket worth over a million yen and takes Conan and Ran to Beika Irohazushi. Mystery fan and cook Wakita is delighted to have Kogoro in the restaurant. Customers Harashima, Munechika, and Ashino arrive separately before Hijirisawa arrives. Hijirisawa claims one of the restaurant`s customers stole her pouch. The pouch was stolen from her on the train, and she tracked the thief down to this restaurant using the GPS on her phone. Hijirisawa reveals that the one million yen dark horse ticket in her pouch was stolen and attempts to find the culprit, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Numéro de déduction au restaurant d`à côté (1re partie)
The Tokyo-Style Detective Show Next Door (Part 1)
となりの江戸前推理ショー (前編)
